statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigurationRecorder) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigDeliveryChannel) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigRule) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
